forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 55. West wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the breeze carries with it a crispness that hints at the lingering warmth of the day. The skies are mostly clear, offering a serene backdrop for the shimmering city lights and the distant silhouette of the Golden Gate. With a low settling at around 55 degrees, a light jacket or sweater will provide a comforting layer against the evening coolness. Though the forecast promises sunshine for tomorrow, this night breathes a gentle tranquility, perfect for a quiet stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to a cozy café, where the warmth of both coffee and community can be savored.

As dawn approaches, anticipation fills the air. Tomorrow will unfold with the sun ascending to a pleasant high near 66 degrees. A gentle west-southwest wind will stir, coaxing away any remnants of fog that may have dared to linger over the bay. With the potential for temperatures to dip slightly in the afternoon, dressing in layers will be wise; a t-shirt under a light jacket can harmonize with the sun’s dance between warmth and coolness. This idyllic weather beckons a leisurely exploration of the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, where art fill the streets and fresh air invites thoughtful discovery. Whether it’s a walk in the park or a visit to an artisan shop, the day is poised to offer moments worth cherishing.
